about_the_game:
Add some green space and glory to your kingdom! This DLC includes 15 parks and 9 new statues - many of which were ideas provided by the community. Each provides the garden happiness bonus to nearby homes. Place regal reclining lion statues or build luxurious palace gardens. Your peasants will appreciate your investment in the parks!

This Park & Statues pack includes:

Statues
  • 2x1 Reclining Lion
  • 2x1 Mounted Knight
  • 1x1 Standing Knight
  • 1x1 Princess
  • 1x1 Gargoyle
  • 1x1 Gnome
  • 1x1 Fish
  • 1x1 Obelisk
  • 1x1 Stone Monolith - You can write your own messages on this one!

Parks
  • 2x2 Goblet of Flowers
  • 2x2 Pond
  • 2x2 Tree of Glory
  • 2x1 Shrub Row
  • 2x1 Spike Row
  • 2x1 Reflecting Pool
  • 1x1 Row of Trees
  • 1x1 Stone Tile
  • 1x1 Small Trees
  • 1x1 Stone Spike
  • 1x1 Bushes
  • 1x1 Tree
  • 1x1 Pine Tree
  • 1x1 Brazier
  • 1x1 Banner
detailed_description:
Add some green space and glory to your kingdom! This DLC includes 15 parks and 9 new statues - many of which were ideas provided by the community. Each provides the garden happiness bonus to nearby homes. Place regal reclining lion statues or build luxurious palace gardens. Your peasants will appreciate your investment in the parks!

This Park & Statues pack includes:

Statues
  • 2x1 Reclining Lion
  • 2x1 Mounted Knight
  • 1x1 Standing Knight
  • 1x1 Princess
  • 1x1 Gargoyle

  • 1x1 Fish
  • 1x1 Obelisk
  • 1x1 Stone Monolith - You can write your own messages on this one!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 2.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+, 2.5GHz
  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 256mb or ATI Radeon HD 5670 256mb or Intel HD Graphics 4600
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470, 2.7GHz or AMD FX-6300, 3.2Ghz
  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, 1gb or AMD Radeon HD 7870, 1gb
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 2.0GHz
  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 256mb or ATI Radeon HD 5670 256mb or Intel HD Graphics 4600
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470, 2.7GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, 1gb or AMD Radeon HD 7870, 1gb
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 256mb or ATI Radeon HD 5670 256mb or Intel HD Graphics 4600

short_description: Add some green space and glory to your kingdom! This DLC includes a wide variety of 15 parks and 9 new statues in various sizes. It also includes a statue that allows you to chisel your own messages on to it!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
